title: Can't Spectate
body: Won't let me spectate any games anymore... is this a known bug?

replies.body: I cant spectate either and I did a repair on the game. Is this a bug? I even reinstalled it{{champion:103}}

I'm not seeing any issues with spectating games right at this moment, but what kind of errors or issues are you having? Some of the game files might have been damaged somehow, so you could first try running a quick repair.
